name: ArterialBloodGasABG
title: Arterial Blood Gas (ABG)
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable panel code(s) for Arterial Blood Gas (ABG).),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of blood for Arterial Blood Gas (ABG).),(Inclusion Criteria: Arterial Blood Gas (ABG) lab test, using the source of arterial blood, coded in LOINC, using panel codes. LOINC will need to be referenced for the individual laboratory observations associated with these panel code(s) .),(Exclusion Criteria: Does not include any codes or concepts which do not represent Arterial Blood Gas (ABG) as defined in the inclusion criteria.)
